specs: Product Description DetailsMake / ModelAcer Aspire E 15 - E5- 576 (517Z)ProcessorIntel® Core™ i5-8250U Processor   MemoryDual-channel DDR3L SDRAM support8 GB of DDR3L system memory, upgradable to 16 GB using two soDIMM modules          Display15.6” Full HD 1920 x 1080, high brightness Acer ComfyView TM LED-backlit TFT LCD 16:9 aspect ratio Ultra-slim design Mercury free, environment friendly GraphicsNVIDIA® GeForce™ MX150, with 2 GB of GDDR5 VRAM                            Audio Compatible with Cortana with Voice Certified for Skype for Business Acer TrueHarmony technology Two built-in stereo speakers Built-in digital microphoneStorageHard disk drive HDD: 1 TB 2.5-inch 5400 RPMOptical media drive8X DVD-Writer double-layer driveM-DISC Ready™ DriveWebcamVideo conferencing HD webcam with 1280 x 720 resolution, 720p HD audio/video recording and High dynamic range imaging (HDR)             Wireless and networkingWLAN  802.11a/b/g/n/ac wireless LAN Operates at 2.4 GHz and 5 GHz 1x1 MU-MIMO technologyWPAN  Bluetooth® 4.1Privacy controlsBIOS user, supervisor, HDD passwordsKensington lock slot   Dimensions and weightDimensions  381.6 (W) x 259 (D) x 23.9/30.2 (H) mm (15.02 x 10.2 x 0.94/1.19 inches)Weight  2.23 kg (4.92 lbs.) with 4-cell battery packPower adapter and batteryPower adapter  3-pin 65 W AC adapterBattery  41.4 Wh 2800 mAh 14.8 V 4-cell Li ion battery, Battery life up to 10.5 hours for models with HD Panel + SSDInput and controlKeyboard:103-/104-/107-key FineTip keyboard with independent standard numeric keypad, international language support, power buttonTouchpad: Multi-gesture touchpad, supporting two-finger; pinch; gestures to open Cortana, Action Center, multitasking; application commands Microsoft Precision Touchpad certification                       Options and accessories3-pin 65 W AC adapterWarrantyThree Year Carry-in Warranty (1 Year for Battery and Adapter)
